<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Shambler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3249)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

A zombie shambler is a slow-moving horror dangerous in larger groups.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zombie_Shambler.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Zombie Shambler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3249)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=782" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 356 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +0; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** -2

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 12 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +0 

**Will** +2 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 20
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Weaknesses**
slashing 5, vitality 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7,
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45)

**Zombie Bite** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The zombie has a creature **grabbed** or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90); **Effect** The zombie makes a jaws [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) melee Strike against that creature with an attack modifier of +7 that deals 1d8+3 piercing damage.

</column>
